channel.title: Need help with my webclient
channel.description:
When I HTML my webclient it goes through the page on freewebs and you have to use a scroller on Bravenet. [b]Here is the HTML:[/b] [code] DoomScape WebClient Java is not installed on your machine or your browser does not allowed Java Applet to run

Get the latest Java technology at http://www.java.com/ [/code] What should I do or use to fix this and make it full screen on the webpage instead of taking up a little bit and going off the page?

item.title: Need help with my webclient
item.dc:creator: @acesoldier acesoldier
item.description:
@acesoldier wrote:

When I HTML my webclient it goes through the page on freewebs and you have to use a scroller on Bravenet.

Here is the HTML:

[code]

DoomScape WebClient Java is not installed on your machine or your browser does not allowed Java Applet to run

Get the latest Java technology at http://www.java.com/ [/code]

What should I do or use to fix this and make it full screen on the webpage instead of taking up a little bit and going off the page?

Read full topic
